# Portfolio Design Overview

## ðŸŽ¨ Design System

### Layout
- **Sidebar Navigation** (Fixed, 256px width)
  - Logo and title at top
  - Navigation menu with icons
  - Social links at bottom
  - Active section highlighting

- **Main Content Area** (Responsive padding)
  - Max width: 1024px
  - Centered content
  - Clean white space

### Color Scheme
```
Primary Blue:   #3b82f6
Purple Accent:  #9333ea
Green Success:  #10b981
Background:     #f9fafb
Text Primary:   #111827
Text Secondary: #6b7280
Border:         #e5e7eb
```

### Typography
- Font Family: Inter
- Headings: Bold, 2xl-6xl
- Body: Regular, base-lg
- Code: Monospace

### Components

#### Hero Section
- Large heading with gradient text
- Subtitle and description
- CTA buttons
- Stats grid (3 columns)

#### About Section
- Two-column grid
- Gradient background cards
- Icon bullets
- Clean typography

#### Skills Section
- Three-column grid
- Category cards with colored backgrounds
- Progress bars with animations
- Skill levels

#### Projects Section
- Three-column grid
- GitHub API integration
- Language badges
- Star/fork counts
- Hover effects

#### Contact Section
- Two-column layout
- Contact info cards
- Form with validation
- Success message

### Animations
- Scroll-triggered fade-ins
- Progress bar animations
- Hover effects
- Smooth transitions

### Responsive Breakpoints
- Mobile: < 768px (Hamburger menu)
- Tablet: 768px - 1024px
- Desktop: > 1024px

## ðŸŽ¯ Prisma-Inspired Features

1. **Clean Sidebar Navigation**
   - Fixed position
   - Clear hierarchy
   - Active state tracking

2. **Professional Color Palette**
   - Light background
   - Blue primary color
   - Subtle borders

3. **Typography-First Design**
   - Clear headings
   - Readable body text
   - Proper spacing

4. **Minimal Animations**
   - Subtle scroll effects
   - Smooth transitions
   - No distracting motion

5. **Card-Based Layout**
   - Rounded corners
   - Subtle shadows on hover
   - Clean borders
